issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development
projectCategory.name: Client

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
Description:
While testing KS, Controls>text field>Soft Input Focus, the soft keyboard remains on screen if the close button is clicked while it is visible.

Steps to Reproduce:
1) Install KS 1.7.0 on a Nexus S
2) Navigate to Base Controls>text field>Soft Input Focus and launch test
3) Click the 3rd field to bring up keyboard
4) Click the "close" button

Result:
Keyboard remains

Expected Result:
Keyboard Hidden

Notes:
Also occurs on 1.6.2
fields.summary: Android: KitchenSink Soft Input test can leave soft KB active when closing test
fields.environment: Nexus S (2.3.2), Titanium Studio, build: 1.0.0.201104280957, Titanium SDK version: 1.7.0 (05/05/11 13:06 1328fa0...)

comments.body:
Still persists on:

SDK build: 1.8.0.1.v20111214093905
Nexsus S (2.3.6), running V8 
Droid 3 (2.3.4), running Rhino

exists on
SDK build:2.0.0.v20120329191102
XOOM(4.0.3) running V8
Resolving ticket as invalid as this version of Kitchen Sink is no longer supported.
